thread.title: Poor Customer service
thread.title_full: Poor Customer service - Review of The Gallivant Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Maya K
title: Poor Customer service
text: I called few times all the phone numbers looking for assistance. It was extremely hard to find someone to even pick up the phone, not to mention that they were not able to help/answer any of my questions but kept saying that I have call back. When called I was not even greeted after I did. I asked the lady (Johany) of the best number to call but she kept saying to call tomorrow. Finally she understood my question since I was just asking for the best number to call and then she said:"Call the same number". She was not polite at all. I asked about her name and she said Johany. I asked the second name and she hung up on me.
